code:
stateDiagram

    Null --> Precommitted: PreCommitSectors
    Precommitted --> Committed: CommitSectors
    Precommitted --> Deleted: CronPreCommitExpiry (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    Committed --> Active: SubmittedWindowPoSt
    Committed --> Faulty: DeclareFault\nSubmitWindowPoSt (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)\nProvingDeadline (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    Committed --> Terminated: TerminateSectors\n(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    Faulty --> Active: SubmittedWindowPoSt (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    Faulty --> Faulty: ProvingDeadline (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    Faulty --> Recovering: DeclareFaultRecovered
    Faulty --> Terminated: EarlyExpiration (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)\nTerminateSectors (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    Recovering --> Active: SubmittedWindowPoSt (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    Recovering --> Faulty: DeclareFault\nProvingDeadline (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    Recovering --> Terminated: TerminateSectors (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    Active --> Active: SubmittedWindowPoSt
    Active --> Faulty: DeclareFault\nSubmitWindowPoSt (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)\nProvingDeadline (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    Active --> Terminated: CronExpiration\nTerminateSectors (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    Terminated --> Deleted: CompactSectors
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
